answers.a: Only antigen is allowed to migrate
answers.b: Only antibody is allowed to migrate
answers.c: Neither antibody nor antigen are allowed to migrate
answers.d: Both antigen and antibody are allowed to migrate

questions.question: 2.Pattern of identity is observed in Ouchterlony double diffusion only if

answers.a: the two antigens are immunologically unrelated
answers.b: the two antigens are partially identical
answers.c: the two antigens are immunologically identical

questions.question: 3.Double diffusion is based on the principle of precipitation
